original_text: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works, and by works was faith made perfect?
korean_text: 네가 보거니와 믿음이 그의 행함과 함께 일하고 행함으로 믿음이 온전하게 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 보느냐 어떻게 믿음이 그의 행위와 함께 일했는지를

sentences.original_text: and by works was faith made perfect
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 행위로 말미암아 믿음이 완전하게 되었느냐를
